attributes.action: have Government recognition of the sacrifice and courage of World War 2 Bomber Command veterans by the award of a Bomber Command Medal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No Bomber Command medal has ever been awarded to World War 2 Bomber Command veterans, despite over 55,000 of them giving their lives for our freedom. Let this omission be recognised before these brave airmen are just memories.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
